cost of failure we often think about just the financial cost first and foremost but actually I'd argue that the
biggest cost is time you can actually get money you can't get time easily once
you've spent that time you don't get it back and if it's going to take you six months or 12 months to prove an idea or

it's right on it really quickly so agility is really important third is you
